name: spa-check
description: Small, copy-paste-able e2e testing in JavaScript and TypeScript supporting SPA navigation, clicking, checking if things exist, etc.

scripts.build: ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --target es6 --lib es2015,dom spa-check.ts && ./node_modules/minify/bin/minify.js spa-check.js > spa-check.min.js && node utils/make-blob.js && ./node_modules/minify/bin/minify.js spa-check.blob-uncompressed.js > spa-check.blob.js && npm run buildCleanup && node utils/make-template.js
scripts.testsBuild: npm run build && npm run testsUpdate

author: Cory Leigh Rahman
